description: Amid mounting citywide tension and warnings from Innovator contacts about possible mass unrest, Nikola is quietly briefed on a covert plan to reset the BCI if the situation worsens.

Faced with a city on the verge of chaos and urged by Innovators, Nikola authorizes the complete reset of BCI data, prioritizing stability over exposure of past manipulation. Preparations for the reset proceed in secrecy.
A trusted Innovator group deploys the reset patch, erasing all BCI personal histories, compliance scores, and behavioral records from the city’s digital infrastructure.

Widespread confusion erupts as the sudden BCI reset locks residents out of essential systems. Housing, transport, and daily services grind to a halt, forcing neighborhoods to improvise with barter and grassroots rule-making.

Power vacuums appear: the Directorate faction demands emergency rule and BCI reinstatement, while citizen groups and teachers organize local councils, debating the city’s next direction amidst ongoing uncertainty.
